record.title: WELCOMING BACK SENATOR JOHNSON
record.narrative:
WELCOMING BACK SENATOR JOHNSON -- (Senate - September 04, 2007)

[Page: S11081]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I would like to announce to the Senate that on Wednesday, Senator Johnson is expected to return. Following the caucus recess period, the Senate will consider a resolution to welcome him back, and I would encourage Members to be on the floor at 2:15 p.m.
